TextStringDefinition.TextString: Change nudity settings.\n\nThese settings affect most of nudity/undressing functions.
Check to enable nudity skills, nudity autonomy, and nudity story progression.
Check to enable Sims using underwear and undressing to underwear.
Choose the type of how 'Undress Completely' interaction should undress Sims.
Select to use Sim native bathing outfit with auto fixing when undressing.
Select to use Sim current outfit as the base when undressing.
Check for Sim bathing outfit to be automatically reset and fixed\nUncheck for Sim bathing outfits to stay untouched, for technical use purposes.
Check for gloves to be undressed with the top part of Sim outfit.
Check for shoes to be undressed with the bottom part of Sim outfit.
Check for socks to be undressed with shoes.
Check for leggings to be undressed with the bottom part of Sim outfit.

Check for Sims to dress up to correct outfit before performing activities that require outfit changing.\nUncheck for Sims to keep the partially undressed outfit when performing activities that require outfit changing.
Choose the type of notifications visibility.
Select to disable displaying notifications about nudity actions.
Select to only display notifications about autonomy nudity actions.
Select to display all notifications about nudity actions.
Check for nudity notifications to be displayed only about household Sims.\nUncheck for nudity notifications to be displayed about all Sims.
Nudity occurrence and autonomy related settings.
Choose the level of nudity occurrence and autonomy.
Select to disable random nudity occurrences as well as Sims nudity autonomy.
Select to enable low base chance of random nudity occurrences as well as Sims nudity autonomy.
Select to enable normal base chance of Random nudity occurrences as well as Sims nudity autonomy.
Change how nudity occurrences and autonomy work.
Check for Sims to randomly having swimwear related accidents when jumping to water.
Check for Sims to randomly not putting on their towel after a shower in public.

Check for Sims to randomly (based on skill level) decide if they want to get naked for undressing interactions.


Specific undressing interactions (like changing to sleep or changing to workout) are affected by the possibility of undressing to nude.
Check for Sims to randomly undress without any context.
Check for Sims to talk about nudity and undress when at a nudity club gathering.
Check for Sims to flash others when at a flashing club gathering.
Check for Sims to never undress around children.
Check for Sims to first undress to underwear before getting naked.\nUncheck for Sims to undress directly to nudity and skip showing underwear.
Check for playable Sims to be included in random nudity occurrences.

Check to enable nudity story progression.


Sims will learn the secrets of living without clothes on while they are not around.
Check for teens being able to participate in nudity interactions.

Check for Sims to allow undressing without limits when the 'Nudity Permitted In Room Sign' is in the room.\nUncheck for Sims to allow undressing when the 'Nudity Permitted In Room Sign' in the room, while the 'No Nudity Permitted On Lot Sign' is present on the lot.
Check for Sims to undress their pants when using a toilet.
Check for Sims to undress their top when breastfeeding.
Cheats to change things that you find annoying.
Check for Sims to respect nudity privacy.
Check for Sims to react to nudity.

'This Sim Body Selector' is a selector for picking naked body parts for the selected Sim.
The body parts that are available to select depend on the Sim Gender Settings of the selected Sim.

Selected body parts in the 'This Sim Body Selector' override any parts selected in the 'All Sims Body Selector'.

Body parts to select are only available if they are placed in your 'Mods' folder and are supported by WickedWhims.

'Random Sims Body Selector' is a selector for picking naked body parts for a random sample of Sims in the world.
The body parts that are available to select depend on the Sim Gender Settings of the selected Sim and only Sims that match the same Gender Settings will be considered for this selector.
Selecting a random body part multiple times will increase the number of Sims that have this part applied.

Selected body parts in the 'Random Sim Body Selector' override any parts selected in the 'All Sims Body Selector'.

Body parts to select are only available if they are placed in your 'Mods' folder and are supported by WickedWhims.

'All Sims Body Selector' is a selector for picking naked body parts for all of the Sims in the world.
The body parts that are available to select depend on the Sim Gender Settings of the selected Sim and only Sims that match the same Gender Settings will be considered for this selector.

Body parts to select are only available if they are placed in your 'Mods' folder and are supported by WickedWhims.
Take off your clothes and discover the wonderful world of Naturism!

The thought of nudity is scarier than nudity itself.

The more you stay naked, the more confidence you gain.
Performing interactions naked lowers the amount of lost hygiene.

Start by changing into more revealing outfits (sleepwear, swimwear or underwear) or admiring your body in mirrors.

{0.SimFirstName}'s new Naturism skill will allow {M0.him}{F0.her} to perform various nudity related activities. As the skill level increases, more will be possible.\nGet into your underwear, sleepwear or swimwear outfit and try to get more comfortable around others.
{0.SimFirstName} is now much more comfortable with nudity! Getting naked outside shouldn't be a big problem anymore.

{0.SimFirstName} is now more confident around others. There is no point to keep this as a secret.

{0.SimFirstName} can now go a step further and become an exhibitionist. Not hiding anything from anybody.
(Buy the 'Exhibitionist' trait in the Sim Rewards Store)
(Benefits of Naturism will be lost after converting to Exhibitionism)
The feeling of liberation, discovery, and freedom is something that {0.SimFirstName} cannot describe.
Take off some clothes and show off your body to others!
Expose your body to others by undressing, flashing or streaking. You have nothing to hide!
{0.SimFirstName} is now much more open to nudity and can flash other Sims! Surprise others with sudden nudity!
{0.SimFirstName} now has no problems with nudity around more Sims.
{0.SimFirstName} feels complete freedom to show your body off anywhere and anytime. There are no barriers for you anymore!
Turn your naturism into exhibitionism and unlock more nudity related interactions.\n\n(At least level 3 of Naturism Skill is required to purchase this trait).
Exhibitionists expose their bodies to gain sexual satisfaction from seeing shocked faces of others.
Sims with no underwear will never be wearing underwear ever again.
The thought of nudity could be scary, but this place pushes anyone's comfort level beyond what is considered appropriate.
Sims that are experienced with Exhibitionism get a lot of joy from flashing others.
When you shed your clothes you also shed just a few of the burdens of everyday life.

How humiliating! Nothing will let {0.SimFirstName} live up the shame from those piercing eyes of other Sims after having seen {M0.him}{F0.her} urinating. Whether urgent or not, this just wasn't worth it.
What did {0.SimFirstName} just see!? Did that Sim really just urinate right here and right now? The call of nature may be strong but what they just did is disgusting!
Click on a Sim and select any flashing option from the Wicked Exhibitionism category.
Click on a mirror and select 'Admire Your Body'.
Click on your Sim and select any outfit undressing option from Wicked Naturism/Exhibitionism category.
Click on a Sim and select any social naturism/exhibitionism option from Wicked Naturism/Exhibitionism category.

Set mannequin top and bottom underwear for the chosen outfit category. Selected underwear will only be used on the picked outfit category outfit.\n\nChanging underwear for sleepwear and swimwear outfit is not available.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims on the lot from explicitly undressing. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The Invisible <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign prevents all Sims on the lot from explicitly undressing. This sign can be placed anywhere on the lot to take effect. It will disappear when in Live Mode.\n\nThe <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign overrides the effect of this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.
<font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from explicitly undressing. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.
**INVISIBLE** <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> (Autonomy Sign)

The Invisible <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign prevents all Sims in a room with this sign from explicitly undressing. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

The <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign allows all Sims in a room with this sign to explicitly undress. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room.

With the 'Nudity Permitted Autonomy Signs Influence' setting enabled, this sign allows Sims, within a room with this sign, to undress without limits.
The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign will be overridden by this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.

The Invisible <font color='#3AAF69'>Nudity Permitted In Room</font> sign allows all Sims in a room with this sign to explicitly undress. This sign has to be placed within a room to take effect, and it only affects Sims within that room. It will disappear when in Live Mode.

With the 'Nudity Permitted Autonomy Signs Influence' setting enabled, this sign allows Sims, within a room with this sign, to undress without limits.
The <font color='#EC262E'>No Nudity Permitted On Lot</font> sign will be overridden by this sign for the room it is placed in. Making nudity allowed only in that room.
{0.SimFirstName} {0.SimLastName} doesn't feel like taking off clothes right now is a good idea.\n\n{0.String}{1.String}{2.String}{3.String}{4.String}{5.String}{6.String}{7.String}{8.String}{9.String}
- The most comfortable place to undress will always be Sim home.\n\n
- Undressing outside requires a lot more courage.\n\n
- Sims around can make it quite embarrassing to undress.\n\n
- No nudity permitted signs on the lot or in the room prevent undressing.\n\n

{0.SimFirstName} {0.SimLastName} doesn't feel like taking off underwear right now is a good idea.\n\n{0.String}{1.String}{2.String}{3.String}{4.String}{5.String}{6.String}{7.String}{8.String}{9.String}
{0.SimFirstName} {0.SimLastName} doesn't feel like flashing Sims right now is a good idea.\n\n{0.String}{1.String}{2.String}{3.String}{4.String}{5.String}{6.String}{7.String}{8.String}{9.String}
{0.SimFirstName} {0.SimLastName} lost {M0.his}{F0.her} swimsuit when jumping to water.
